title: Manhunt: The Raoul Moat Story
overview: After killing one person and wounding two others in a two-day shooting spree in July 2010, 37-year-old Raoul Moat went on the run. This is the story of the investigation—and how Moat escaped police officers’ clutches for a week.

title: Privacy Breach
overview: After witnessing the violent arrest of Ted Carter (Ethan N), Kit Porter (Henri L), a tech savvy baseball fan, uncovers a secret government conspiracy to watch over every citizen. After teaming up with Max Stone (Josh M) and Doug Reese (Charlie R), the crew try to take down the surveillance systems and restore privacy to the world. Nominated for multiple yo mama awards.  Privacy Breach stands as a potent warning against surveillance, and begs an important question. How far will we go for law and order? After an emotional clip from the film went viral in 2020, directors everywhere looked towards this film for inspiration. Cited as "Your favourite film-makers favourite film", Privacy Breach tries, and succeeds, to tell a unique story that will remain unrivaled in the coming decades. 2020 is the new 1984.  Privacy Breach. This aint yo daddys dystopian horror
tagline: This aint yo daddys dystopian

title: Open House
overview: While robbing a house, Julio asks Ricardo to pretend to be the house's owners. Both of them take advantage of the solitude of their surroundings to express what they truly feel for each other.

title: The danger is with them 4
overview: The story of 3 detectives and their hunt for criminals, and how things get complicated when a case of money laundering takes an extremely dangerous path, when very powerful people are found to be linked to it
tagline: AL-KHATAR MAEHOM 4

title: The Killer Nanny
overview: The murder trial of British au pair Louise Woodward was televised live in the UK transfixing viewers and splitting public opinion about whether she was guilty or innocent.

title: Noogie's Time to Shine
overview: After dimwitted film noir-o-phile Ned 'Noogie' Krapczak (pronounced 'crap-chicK,' not 'crap sack') turns up dead in Miami, the FBI, local police and a couple of hapless Floridians all want to know what happened to the three-point-two million dollars in cash he stole.

title: Laandhar
overview: ACP Aravind, an honest and sincere police officer, is assigned with unenviable task of capturing an armed masked killer. Amidst the hunt for the perpetrator, his wife Jaanu goes missing, leaving him racing against time to find her.
tagline: Icon of Night

title: An Awful Thing Has Gone and Happened
overview: When her brother is killed, a young woman is called back home to a small mountain town. But with her father missing, and her brother's killer terrorizing the town, she's got to discover the truth about her brother before the killer discovers her.

title: The Necklace
overview: An unsuspecting homeless man comes across a dead body and a valuable necklace. When he tries to do the right thing, he finds himself trapped in an incredibly dangerous situation.

title: 5 Musketeers
overview: 5 Musketeers are friends since their childhood. When Refik resists to proceed the big robbery they had planned, his friends are ready to protect him. This is a story for what friendship is about.

title: Artifice
overview: When a young convict is caught by law enforcement, his only way out is to infiltrate and deceive his own team as they gear up for their biggest score yet.
tagline: A high-wire act.

title: The Case of the Unknown
overview: A family was killed in Xiaoliu Village. The Public Security Bureau sent an investigation team to discover the suspect. Unexpectedly, there was someone else behind the suspect.

title: Road to Terzetto
overview: Three brothers that never met each other are getting an inheritance from their estranged father. On the journey to their inheritance things aren't always what they seem.

title: The Ultimatum
overview: Loyalty and value are put to the ultimate test when three friends are pulled into a life-changing predicament by a mutual acquaintance.

title: Maya
tagline: divided by tables. united by bullet.

title: Save My XL Bully: Death Row Dogs
overview: After maulings and killings across the UK, a colourful bunch of owners battle to save the lives of their beloved XL bully dogs in the run-up to a government ban.

title: The Dark Side of the Moon
overview: The interview which seems to be wholesome in the beginning will become uncomfortable for one of them when unusual questions and statements are thrown.
tagline: That's what they say! Life's grand in HOLLYWOOD.

title: Into the Night
overview: Artemio is a photojournalist who portrays the murder of a sex worker he knows and begins a search to find the murderer.

title: Infinite Orbit: Lies in the Mask
overview: A crime film about what happens in a three-story villa where people with various occupations live.

title: Silver Fish
overview: Silver Fish is a comedic film noir. It tells the story of detective Timothy and his partner James. (No men were involved in the production of this film).
tagline: ...and that's how James Marigold died and I caught Mr Fish Silver.

title: Uso-Tsuki
overview: A man's worst nightmare may just be the truth.

title: Hunt for the Canal Murderer: John Sweeney
overview: John Sweeney murdered and dismembered the bodies of two ex-girlfriends before dumping them in canals in London and Rotterdam in 1990 and 1992. This programme examines the police investigation that finally brought him to justice after evading capture for years, and reveals how John Sweeney was ultimately undone by his own hand.

title: The Blood of Desire
overview: Tortoise, a street thug with a hard life, happens to land a big mission, which he considers a ‘game changing’ chance; an opportunity to go from rags to riches. He volunteers to set up Hare to bring the liver of Hare for his big boss the Dragon King, who needs a transplant. As the fate would have it, however, he finds out that Hare is actually his childhood friend from the orphanage and Tortoise's sister owes Hare a lot from a long time ago. Torn between friendship and ‘a better life’, Tortoise is faced with a life and death choice.

title: Toxic Impulses
overview: An ex-police detective tries to help a bank robber take down her handler.

title: Mordkommission Calw - Warlord
overview: Inspectors Karl Jäger, Lola Kraft and junior police officer Jasmin Stein must solve the brutal murder of a hunter whose dismembered body was found in the middle of the forest. The investigation points to illegal arms trafficking and initially leads to the Reich Citizens' milieu. Another blood trail was also found at the crime scene...

title: Killing Hope
overview: A short film.

title: I Love Juliet
overview: When Kyle, a pimp in love with Juliet, and Trevor, her wanna-be mob-affiliated boyfriend, find themselves in dire straits, they devise a plan to kidnap Romeo, a wealthy movie producer who is infatuated with Juliet.

title: A Simple Robbery
overview: Becky and Stacey are two friends who enjoy taking money from rich men. But tragedy strikes when a robbery doesn't go as planned.
tagline: It was supposed to be easy.

title: Kurukku
overview: A revered police officer investigates murders shaking the city.

title: CRUZ
overview: Unconventional private investigator Alejandro Cruz is forced to get his hands dirty to rescue hostages from an old enemy.
tagline: ONE WHO DOESEN'T KNOW HOW TO DIE

title: Night Curfew
overview: During a deadly pandemic, Dr. Durga and her exhausted team at a private hospital face chaos when a new patient, Tina, mysteriously dies. Her menacing husband, Raghuram, demands the death be certified as COVID-19, but Dr. Durga discovers signs of murder. With Raghuram taking control of the hospital, Dr. Durga must protect her patients and solve the mystery of Tina's death in this suspenseful, high-stakes thriller based on true events.
tagline: man is more dangerous than anything..

title: Rahasyamoy
overview: One day Abhimanyu was found dead in his bedroom and Tithi was found senseless in the drawing room. Is this an open and shut case for DCP Anish Roy or will he go into the depth of the mystery?

title: Men of Sacrifice
tagline: EOD - Explosive Ordnance Disposal

title: Brief Case
overview: A short film about a US business man who came to Africa, Namibia, to finalize a very important business deal. Unfortunately, his brief case—which had important documents—was snatched or robbed from him and he is determined to get it back. Go into a journey with Mr. Tom as he fights to get his important documents back.
tagline: A Namibian Thriller Film.

title: When Three Become One
overview: The husband of a woman diagnosed with a fatal bone disease must decide whether or not to submit to his wife's lover's demands in order to save the life of the woman he loves. In agreement to end his marriage with her, otherwise, she dies.
tagline: When lust leads to infidelity and obsession leads to murder

title: The last passenger
overview: In a poorly served metro station, calm and silence reign. Only two men are waiting. However, in a short time, this very ordinary place will transform into a scene of chaos.

title: The Great South
overview: Two best friends must navigate the tough streets of South Auckland to buy a bottle of milk.
tagline: When things go South Auckland

title: Walk.
overview: When The Walker gets in hot water with some vague crime boss guy, he will risk it all (not much) to use his walking skills...to walk.  Not based on any film whatsoever.
tagline: GET IN. GET OUT. GET THE CHICKEN CRIMPY SHAPES

title: Street Cred
overview: Life is a game of survival, when you're surrounded by nothing but wrong, but still trying to do what's right. Niko and her friends grow up on the South side of Chicago, dealing with the many challenges of today's urban society. She faces a life changing experience that pushes her to the streets. And when the streets call, sometimes it's hard not to answer.
tagline: When the streets call... it's hard not to answer.

title: Salada de Furtos: Os Quatro Delinquentes
overview: A rare and exclusive spicy booze arrives at the city of Cuiabá and four young people plan its robbery, but their lack of experience and chemistry can be a deal-breaker.
tagline: They are the Four Delinquents. Astucious. Greedy. Juicy. But flawed.

title: Sloppy
overview: A young detective in search of evidence of a crime.

title: A Violent Tale
overview: The lives of Hitman, two police officers, two brothers, a drug lord, a girl and a gang of three murderers are intertwined with violence and bloodshed.
tagline: The lives of Hitman, two police officers, two brothers, a drug lord, a girl and a gang of three murderers are intertwined with violence and bloodshed.

title: Coming Clean
overview: A recluse with a violent secret must stand up to his gangster boss to save his friend, an ex-junkie who is trying to get him clean. A crime horror film about human connection, addiction and dependency.

title: Terminus
overview: A Ghanaian chemist, who in a bid to vindicate his company in a lawsuit stumbles on something even more dangerous in the process - a hidden chemical formula altered for testing and profit gains by a pharmaceutical giant.

title: Not for Nothing
overview: NOT FOR NOTHING is a crime drama feature film about two brothers, along with a handful of their ragtag South Philly buddies, who end up sparking an old style mob type war on the streets of Philly after the girlfriend of one of the brother's mysteriously dies from an opiate overdose.

title: bonny
overview: Memories cascade and fade as Bonny remembers the one she loved and the life they lived on the run...

title: Hit A Lick 2
overview: After getting cheated out of his money. A prideful gangster goes on a crime spree to regain his money and his respect.

title: All the Light We Cannot See
overview: A father and his son become the hunted ones in a hunt because of their rifles.

title: The Black Rose
overview: A Blackridge County gang member, held for questioning, recalls what happened to him on the night of his initiation.
tagline: Justice blooms in darkness.

title: El Redentor
overview: THIS IS A STORY OF REDEMPTION.
tagline: Cesar is searching for peace of mind. After five years living in the shadows he comes out to fight against his demons.

title: Drop
overview: Aging out of his art form, a contemporary dancer is forced to deal with an unknown future while desperately trying to save a young friend from a life of crime echoing his own shady past.
tagline: Don't let it drop

title: Strawberry Smasher
overview: A story about two detectives trying to solve a murder, but the detectives are not the brightest
tagline: Only the berry best could crack this case

title: Der Masuren-Krimi - Marzanna, Göttin des Todes
overview: One day, the village policeman Leon Pawlak has to record an unusual report. 15-year-old Lucja reports the murder of her therapist. According to her, the crime hasn't even happened yet - but the half-orphan saw it in a dream. Therefore, Dr. Viktoria Wex sees no need for action for the time being. But that all changes when the therapist's dead body is found in a lake...

title: Touch
overview: An apathetic police unit brings in a mysterious young woman to help solve a grisly homicide.

title: Athigaari
overview: Tasked with finding out the truth behind his fellow colleague's death, a police officer begins by reviewing his previous cases. Slowly, he traces the steps of the murderer until he discovers the killer's master plan.

title: Designer’s Game
overview: Designer’s Game is a crime drama short film that follows a young broke graphic designer into the descent of a life of crime working in the deep web in the city of Chicago. With a new-found life with easy money, he thinks all is okay until a client comes back, but not in the way he thinks.
tagline: Design to survive.

title: Troll
overview: Counter-injury is always more ruthless than injury !!
tagline: Be sensible

title: A Twist of Fate
overview: A pair of robbers cross paths through happenstance.
tagline: When fate makes thieves of them all.

title: Mathilde
overview: Detective John Carlet is on the verge of retiring from the vice. However, he has to confront one more time to an old case : an unusual investigation which will leave a mark on him for the rest of his life. A little girl has disappeared, the young Mathilde.

title: Hanói!
overview: Siset, a young boy with a dark past seeks redemption in rural Catalonia in 1952, through a confession to Father Barroso. In this encounter, hidden secrets and deep desires are confronted, all while fervently exploring morality and repressed lust in post-war misery.
tagline: You have to understand that there are things that are above you. And that woman was one of them.

title: Murder in a Teacup
overview: When members of a workforce began falling violently ill, locals believed a virus was sweeping the area, but after the death of two men it became clear that the only impurity was a serial poisoner with a toxic past.

title: Daisychain
overview: A young woman who sees no reason to continue her miserable existence, hires a professional to end it for her. However even for a professional, the job may not be as easy as it looks.
tagline: A simple job isn't always easy.

title: "Gumdrop", a short horror
overview: Gumdrop is a short film noir/horror that delves into the psyche of Sampson, a secretive weapon dealer for a crime syndicate. Haunted by his past traumas, he struggles to maintain his sanity as he receives a rogue order that puts him in danger. Directed by JZ Murdock, with music by Andrea Fioravanti and Alex Dewell, this film has won 16 international awards, including Best Noir, Best Horror, and Outstanding Achievement in Transgressive Cinema and Culture (TCCC) - a category that honors films that defy the mainstream and challenge the status quo like: Eraserhead, Pink Flamingos, El Topo, and The Rocky Horror Picture Show. For more on Sampson's story, read the true-crime short horror story, "Gumdrop City" (2012) by JZ Murdock.
tagline: Appearances can be deceiving. Meet Sampson: the solitary distributor with a mysterious double life, where the tools of the trade are just the tip of the iceberg.

title: Untitled 1
overview: An experimental short film by Davi Gautto made as school project.

title: Only Time Will Tell
overview: Dimitri is lonely and depressed: since his shop in party goods went bankrupt, he has been struggling with a dead-end situation, with all the mess in his house and everyday troubles like a leaking freezer. Marina recently ended her relationship and decided to set off on an adventure. She finds Dimitri via a website for cheap lodgings. It seems something beautiful may develop between them, perhaps even romantically. But not everything is what it seems in this dark fairy-tale.

title: Beauty Is Skin Deep
overview: Who is stalking the students of Glenwood High School, and why? The small town of Glenwood is rocked by a strain of unsolved murders which include three of Glenwood High School's very own students. Glenwood Detectives John Brooks and Victoria Morales are working as fast as they can to hunt down the killer. ...

title: Shooter
overview: A ruthless Punjabi gangster and his friends clash with a rival gang protecting a corrupt politician.

title: Between Shadows
overview: 1977, two killers face each other after a poorly executed job. They get worried when they discover that the situation is even worse than expected.

title: Life Of A Soldier
overview: The wife of a former general in the German army received a letter in witch she was informed that her husband has to enlist in the German army and fight on the frontline. Affected by this news, she opposed the commanders who brought the letter, which shot her on the site. Her husband, in an act of revenge, starts being a hero on the frontline, violating orders and deciding the fate of the battle of Verdun.
tagline: Mondern but classic take on the life of a WW1 soldier

title: And So I Stayed
overview: AND SO I STAYED is an award-winning documentary about survivors of abuse fighting for their lives and spending years behind bars. These women paid a steep price with long prison sentences, lost time with loved ones, and painful memories. Formerly incarcerated survivor-advocate Kim Dadou Brown, who met her wife while incarcerated, is a driving force in the passage of New York’s Domestic Violence Survivors Justice Act (DVSJA), a new law meant to prevent survivors from receiving harsh prison sentences for their acts of survival. Nikki Addimando, a mother of two young children, suffered the consequences when a judge didn’t follow the law’s guidelines. Tanisha Davis, a single mother who was ripped away from her son in 2013, is hopeful the new law is her way out of a harsh prison sentence.
tagline: This film is made for and by survivors. For them/us to feel heard, seen, and believed.

title: The Whistleblower
overview: Newspaperman Harry Powers has had it writing for those stinking tabloids, but he may have just found his golden goose...if he can keep his head...
tagline: Discover what lies beneath the fourth estate!

title: Hopetown
overview: An ex-Golden Glove champion repairs a broken bond with his sister while sabotaging a gun trafficking scheme.
tagline: One man will stand up for what's RIGHT.

title: The Jekyll and Hyde Conspiracy
overview: A young private detective gets more than he bargained for when he pursues the anonymous killer of his friend, all the while falling further into a conspiracy that may involve his over-eager partner Eugene.
tagline: Will you be able to withstand the terror when the conspiracy is revealed?

title: Just the Janitor
overview: After a school janitor's shady past comes to light, he's forced to choose between helping his former partner-in-crime or protecting innocent students.

title: White Lies
overview: Now grown, two childhood best friends find that their little white lies add up to deadly consequences.
tagline: Don't get burned by the hustle.

title: Dilli Kaand
overview: The movie 'Dilli Kaand' is actually based on all of the incidents of sexual assault cases within the nation. “So far, the investigation of cases of sexual violence has been shown in many films. Whereas, our film dwells on the severity of both physical and mental trauma of the victim and those close to her.
